content:
Why is import Mathlib not working in the Lean 4 web app?

https://live.lean-lang.org/#codez=JYWwDg9gTgLgBAWQIYwBYBtgCMg

There I'm getting the error message unknown module prefix 'Mathlib'.

Discussed here : #general > `import Mathlib` not working in `live.lean-lang.org`?.
For now you can go to settings in the web editor and set the Lean version to Mathlib stable.
Quinn Culver has marked this topic as resolved.
